#on local
```{r}
library(data.table)

# HiCHIP
# k4me3

loops_k4me3 = fread("largedata/S3b_K4me3_HiChIP.txt",header = T, data.table = F)

s1_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$s1 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$s1 <= 180000000))
e1_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$e1 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$e1 <= 180000000))
s2_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$s2 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$s2 <= 180000000))
e2_mads = which((loops_k4me3$Chr == 3) & (loops_k4me3$e2 >= 150000000) & (loops_k4me3$e2 <= 180000000))

id_mads_s = sort(unique(c(s1_mads, e1_mads, s2_mads, e2_mads)))
loops_k4me3 = loops_k4me3[id_mads_s,]
rownames(loops_k4me3) = 1:nrow(loops_k4me3)

#nisnps

# nisnps of days to silk 
nisnps_k4me3_ds = fread("largedata/march_20/DaystoSilk_0.2_diffmed_sl_sigma_ls_adpt_results.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
id = which(!(nisnps_k4me3_ds$idtag %in% c("_indirect", "_tot_indirect","_tot_direct_indirect"))) 
nisnps_k4me3_ds = nisnps_k4me3_ds[id,c(1,3,4)]
nisnps_k4me3_ds$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", nisnps_k4me3_ds$location))
nisnps_k4me3_ds$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", nisnps_k4me3_ds$location))

# nisnps of GDD to silk 
nisnps_k4me3_gdds = fread("largedata/march_20/GDDDaystoSilk_0.2_diffmed_sl_sigma_ls_adpt_results.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
id = which(!(nisnps_k4me3_gdds$idtag %in% c("_indirect", "_tot_indirect","_tot_direct_indirect"))) 
nisnps_k4me3_gdds = nisnps_k4me3_gdds[id,c(1,3,4)]
nisnps_k4me3_gdds$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", nisnps_k4me3_gdds$location))
nisnps_k4me3_gdds$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", nisnps_k4me3_gdds$location))


# nisnps of days to tassel 
nisnps_k4me3_dt = fread("largedata/march_20/DaysToTassel_0.2_diffmed_sl_sigma_ls_adpt_results.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
id = which(!(nisnps_k4me3_dt$idtag %in% c("_indirect", "_tot_indirect","_tot_direct_indirect"))) 
nisnps_k4me3_dt = nisnps_k4me3_dt[id,c(1,3,4)]
nisnps_k4me3_dt$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", nisnps_k4me3_dt$location))
nisnps_k4me3_dt$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", nisnps_k4me3_dt$location))

# nisnps of GDD to tassel 
nisnps_k4me3_gddt = fread("largedata/march_20/GDDDaystoTassel_0.2_diffmed_sl_sigma_ls_adpt_results.csv", header = T, data.table = F)
id = which(!(nisnps_k4me3_gddt$idtag %in% c("_indirect", "_tot_indirect","_tot_direct_indirect"))) 
nisnps_k4me3_gddt = nisnps_k4me3_gddt[id,c(1,3,4)]
nisnps_k4me3_gddt$chr = as.integer(gsub("X|\\..*", "", nisnps_k4me3_gddt$location))
nisnps_k4me3_gddt$pos = as.integer(gsub("X[0-9]*\\.","", nisnps_k4me3_gddt$location))


library("GenomicRanges")
library("plyr")
# 0 overlap of nisnps of days to silk with loops of k4me3

grc <- with(nisnps_k4me3_dt, GRanges(seqnames=chr, IRanges(start=pos, end=pos)))

grf1 <- with(loops_k4me3, GRanges(seqnames=Chr, IRanges(start=s1, end=e1)))

### find overlaps between the two
tb1 <- findOverlaps(query=grf1, subject=grc)
tb1 <- as.matrix(tb1)

overlap1 = cbind(nisnps_k4me3_dt[tb1[,2],], loops_k4me3[tb1[,1],])


grf2 <- with(loops_k4me3, GRanges(seqnames=Chr, IRanges(start=s2, end=e2)))

### find overlaps between the two
tb2 <- findOverlaps(query=grf2, subject=grc)
tb2 <- as.matrix(tb2)

overlap2 = cbind(nisnps_k4me3_dt[tb2[,2],], loops_k4me3[tb2[,1],])

overlapc = rbind(overlap1, overlap2)

```

```{r}
o_nisnps_loops_dt = overlapc

o_nisnps_loops_gddt = overlapc

o_nisnps_loops_gdds = overlapc

o_nisnps_loops_ds = overlapc


# the overlaps are the same across dt gddt gdds
fwrite(o_nisnps_loops_ds, "largedata/march_20/nisnp_overlap_k4me3_ds.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)
fwrite(o_nisnps_loops_dt, "largedata/march_20/nisnp_overlap_k4me3_dt.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)
fwrite(o_nisnps_loops_gdds, "largedata/march_20/nisnp_overlap_k4me3_gdds.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)
fwrite(o_nisnps_loops_gddt, "largedata/march_20/nisnp_overlap_k4me3_gddt.txt", sep = "\t", row.names = F, quote = F)
```
